name: The Sailor (MoGamer09, M_DC)
description:
Made for #teamseas

Welcome to the ocean, we would like to show you all of it´s beauty. But sadly the ocean got filled by lots of trash and every few seconds, more trash appears.

Clean all the trash up, by moving the boat with WASD or the arrow keys.
You can push the trash in the direction the boat is moving. Like this, connect three pieces of trash or more and they will disappear.

But be careful, there is also nuclear waste in the ocean. After a given time those barrels will turn into toxic splashes. And those can´t be moved!
Luckily you only need to connect two of them.


Music: Acoustic Breeze from Bensound.com
